name: Bose Companion 20 Speakers
Features: [TrueSpace stereo digital processing circuitry: Enhances the listening experience so sound seems to come from a sound stage wider than the two speakers., Proprietary digital signal processing: Delivers crisp, clear performance at all listening levels., Advanced technologies: Delivers powerful low-note performance and room-filling sound., Control pod: Owners have an intuitive, conveniently located volume control and mute function, and can easily connect headphones or a second source, such as an iPod, iPhone or other audio device., Compact elegant appearance: Sleek look complements almost any décor, while fitting neatly on a desk or other surface without the need for an additional bass module., Touch-sensitive mute on control pod: Owners can quickly mute the system with a simple touch., Dual audio inputs: Allows system to be used with a computer and an iPod, iPhone or other audio device – simultaneously or separately., Active electronic equalization: Music is reproduced accurately, with natural tonal balance and clarity.]
